pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, July 11, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, July 11, 2016: 

Kyiv, Ukraine

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Babyn Yar Monument

Babyn Yar Monument

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


10:05 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Park of Eternal Glory and lay a wreath on the tomb of the Unknown Soldier.

Park of Eternal Glory

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity


10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Holodomor Monument and observe a moment of silence.

Holodomor Monument

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity


10:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Holodomor Commemoration Museum.

Holodomor Commemoration Museum

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only


11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Official Welcoming Ceremony at the Presidential Administration Building.

Presidential Administration Building

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity


11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Ukraine, His Excellency Petro Poroshenko.

Presidential Administration Building

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Signing Ceremony.

State Ceremony Hall, 2nd floor
Presidential Administration Building

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


12:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with President Poroshenko.

State Ceremony Hall, 2nd floor
Presidential Administration Building

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage


1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a working luncheon with President Poroshenko.

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only


3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Ukraine, Volodymyr Groysman.

Club of the Cabinet Ministers

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


3:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will lay flowers at the Cross of the Revolution Place and observe a moment of silence at Maidan Square.

Maidan Square

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity


4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chairman of Parliament of Ukraine, Mr. Andriy Parubiy.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Leaders of Change.

Fairmont Grand Hotel Kyiv

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
